sentence.Network_en: They said the present system of military conscription should be phased out.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们说，当前的征兵体系应当逐步废除。

sentence.Network_en: Many young men are trying to get away from compulsory military conscription.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多年轻人试图逃避强制征兵的政策。

sentence.Network_en: All adult males will be liable for conscription.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有成年男子都有义务应征入伍。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 征_百度百科 ... ⑴ 征兆；迹象[ symbol] ◎ 征兵[ conscription] ◎ 征尘[ dust which settles on one during a journey].
征兵制(Conscription)：以民主主义和冶金术为前提，可造来福枪手。 　　兵法(Tactics)：以统御术和征兵制为前提，可建造骑兵和山地部 …
the man flee to the mountain to avoid the conscription ., 为了逃避徵兵 , 那个人躲到山里去了.
Congress （美国等国的）国会，议会conscription 征兵，强迫征募conservatism 保守主义，守旧性

list.abs: 写出“兵”的不同... ... ◎ 兵部[ Department of War in feudal China] ◎ 兵差[ conscript labour] ◎ 兵丁[ rank-and-file soldier].
as Nazis start losing the war they conscript thousands of teenagers into a " British legion " of the Waffen-SS .当纳粹德国开始输掉战争的时候，，他们招募了数以千计的青少年加入武装党卫队的退伍军人协会。
conscribe 招募conscript fathers 参议员conscript 被征召的

one article is added as Article 8 : " The work of directly enlisting volunteer soldiers from non-military departments shall be handled by conscription offices at various levels . "增加一条，作为第八条：“从非军事部门直接招收志愿兵的工作，由各级征兵办公室负责办理。”

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: via French (conscription was introduced in France in 1798), from late Latin conscriptio(n-) 'levying of troops', from Latin conscribere 'write down together, enrol', from con- 'together' + scribere 'write'

entry.def: Conscription is officially making people in a particular country join the armed forces.

example.ex: All adult males will be liable for conscription.
example.tran: 所有成年男子都有义务应征入伍。

auth_sentence.content: With conscription still in effect...I was certain to be drafted.
auth_sentence.res_content: With conscription still in effect...I was certain to be drafted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With conscription still in effect...I was certain to be drafted.

auth_sentence.content: He said if conscription ended then the military would not represent the entire population.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said if conscription ended then the military would not represent the entire population.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said if conscription ended then the military would not represent the entire population.

auth_sentence.content: Max had left Poland to avoid conscription, and set up in haberdashery in Commercial Street.
auth_sentence.res_content: Max had left Poland to avoid conscription, and set up in haberdashery in Commercial Street.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Max had left Poland to avoid conscription, and set up in haberdashery in Commercial Street.

sentences.en: He was rejected by the conscription office because he was under age.
sentences.cn: 征兵办公室没有接受他,因为他还未成年。

sentences.en: He’s been worried that the government will introduce conscription ever since the war began.
sentences.cn: 战争开始后,他担心政府会采用强制征召制度。

sentences.en: The reintroduction of conscription sparked off a major rebellion.
sentences.cn: 再次征兵引发了一次大规模的暴乱。
